TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen , born in DATE and presently in the penitentiary of ORG for the Former GPE ( ORG ) at GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .

At the time when he lodged his application with the ORG the applicant was in custody in GPE ORG , ORG , in the context of criminal proceedings pending against him before ORG ( Županijski sud u GPE ) for kidnapping , murder and participation in a group that committed a crime .
On DATE the applicant was indicted by the ORG on CARDINAL counts including crimes against humanity , grave breaches of LAW and violations of the laws and customs of war .
On DATE ORG ordered that the applicant be handed over to the ORG . Both ORG , upon the applicant ’s appeal , upheld that decision .
On DATE the applicant lodged with ORG CARDINAL request which was not granted by decision of the President of the Fourth Section of the same day .
He is presently in custody in the penitentiary of the ORG at GPE , the GPE , in the context of criminal proceedings pending against him .
